instructions.1: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
instructions.2: In a 10x15 inch baking dish, combine the meat, minestrone soup, tomato soup, water and onion soup mix. Mix well.
instructions.3: Bake at 250 degrees F (120 degrees C) for 8 hours. (Note: If needed, you can bake for less time at a higher temperature; just make sure that the meat is completely cooked through.)

questions.question: In Step 3, is the meat from Step 2 being used?
Is meat from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to cook the meat in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
